name: Creamy Jalapeno Deviled Eggs
author: brandikay1128
summary: These are creamy deviled eggs with an edge that go well with BBQ chicken on the grill and macaroni salad. You can use piping tips to create a beautiful filling design.
ingredients: 10  large hard-boiled eggs, peeled and halved lengthwise
½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened
1 small jalapeno pepper, seeded and diced
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Spoon egg yolks into a bowl
Add cream cheese, mayonnaise, and garlic powder; mix well
Fold 3 crumbled slices of bacon and jalapeno pepper into egg yolk mixture; season with salt and pepper
Fill each egg white half with egg yolk filling
Sprinkle remaining crumbled bacon over filling and top with paprika
Chill in refrigerator for about 1 hour before serving
